name: Thunder Summoner's Crown
title: Lightning and Rain: Thunder Summoner's Crown
desc: "The song pierced the storm's low hum, ripped through the clouds, and bestowed upon it, light."

skills.desc:
When a character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Electro Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
